name: R4B-AdverseEvent-R5-AdverseEvent
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B AdverseEvent into FHIR R5

element.display: Medical care, research study or other healthcare event causing physical injury

target.display: An event that may be related to unintended effects on a patient or research participant
target.comment: R4B `AdverseEvent` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AdverseEvent`

R4B `AdverseEvent.actuality` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AdverseEvent.actuality` - actuality has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/adverse-event-actuality|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/adverse-event-actuality|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: product-problem | product-quality | product-use-error | wrong-dose | incorrect-prescribing-information | wrong-technique | wrong-route-of-administration | wrong-rate | wrong-duration | wrong-time | expired-drug | medical-device-use-error | problem-different-manufacturer | unsafe-physical-environment

target.display: wrong-patient | procedure-mishap | medication-mishap | device | unsafe-physical-environment | hospital-aquired-infection | wrong-body-site
target.comment: R4B `AdverseEvent.category` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `AdverseEvent.category` - category changed the binding strength from Extensible to Example
R4B `AdverseEvent.contained` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AdverseEvent.contained`

element.display: Who  was involved in the adverse event or the potential adverse event

target.comment: R4B `AdverseEvent.detected` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AdverseEvent.detected`

target.display: The Encounter associated with the start of the AdverseEvent
target.comment: R4B `AdverseEvent.encounter` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AdverseEvent.encounter`

element.display: Type of the event itself in relation to the subject

target.comment: R4B `AdverseEvent.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `AdverseEvent.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `AdverseEvent.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AdverseEvent.id`
R4B `AdverseEvent.identifier` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `AdverseEvent.identifier` - identifier changed from scalar to array (max cardinality from 1 to *)

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R4B `AdverseEvent.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AdverseEvent.implicitRules`
R4B `AdverseEvent.language` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `AdverseEvent.language` - language made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/all-languages|5.0.0
R4B `AdverseEvent.location` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AdverseEvent.location`
R4B `AdverseEvent.meta` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AdverseEvent.meta`

R4B `AdverseEvent.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `AdverseEvent.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: resolved | recovering | ongoing | resolvedWithSequelae | fatal | unknown

target.display: Type of outcome from the adverse event
target.comment: R4B `AdverseEvent.outcome` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `AdverseEvent.outcome` - outcome changed from scalar to array (max cardinality from 1 to *); outcome changed the binding strength from Required to Example
R4B `AdverseEvent.recordedDate` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AdverseEvent.recordedDate`

R4B `AdverseEvent.recorder` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `AdverseEvent.recorder` - recorder has change due to type change: R4B `recorder` `Reference` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `recorder`

element.display: Effect on the subject due to this event

target.display: Seriousness or gravity of the event
target.comment: R4B `AdverseEvent.seriousness` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AdverseEvent.seriousness`

target.display: Research study that the subject is enrolled in
target.comment: R4B `AdverseEvent.study` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AdverseEvent.study`

R4B `AdverseEvent.subject` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `AdverseEvent.subject` - subject has change due to type change: R4B `subject` `Reference` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `subject`

element.display: The suspected agent causing the adverse event

target.display: The suspected agent causing the adverse event
target.comment: R4B `AdverseEvent.suspectEntity` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AdverseEvent.suspectEntity`

element.display: Information on the possible cause of the event

target.display: Information on the possible cause of the event
target.comment: R4B `AdverseEvent.suspectEntity.causality` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `AdverseEvent.suspectEntity.causality` - causality changed from array to scalar (max cardinality from * to 1)

element.display: Assessment of if the entity caused the event

target.display: Author of the information on the possible cause of the event
target.comment: R4B `AdverseEvent.suspectEntity.causality.author` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `AdverseEvent.suspectEntity.causality.author` - author has change due to type change: R4B `author` `Reference` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `author`

R4B `AdverseEvent.suspectEntity.causality.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `AdverseEvent.suspectEntity.causality.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `AdverseEvent.suspectEntity.causality.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AdverseEvent.suspectEntity.causality.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `AdverseEvent.suspectEntity.causality.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `AdverseEvent.suspectEntity.causality.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

R4B `AdverseEvent.suspectEntity.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `AdverseEvent.suspectEntity.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `AdverseEvent.suspectEntity.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AdverseEvent.suspectEntity.id`

element.display: Refers to the specific entity that caused the adverse event
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `AdverseEvent.suspectEntity.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `AdverseEvent.suspectEntity.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R4B `AdverseEvent.text` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AdverseEvent.text`
